org.seedstack.business.util.inmemory

Class DefaultInMemoryRepository<A extends AggregateRoot<I>,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.business.domain.BaseRepository<A,I>
      • org.seedstack.business.util.inmemory.BaseInMemoryRepository<A,I>
        • org.seedstack.business.util.inmemory.DefaultInMemoryRepository<A,I>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Repository<A,I>

    @GenericImplementation
 @InMemory
public class DefaultInMemoryRepository<A extends AggregateRoot<I>,I>
extends BaseInMemoryRepository<A,I>
    Default repository implementation for in-memory persistence.

    When no custom repository exists for the aggregate, this in-memory implementation can be injected for Repository with the qualifier @InMemory.
